articles.content: Starting from today, every first Friday of the month, all brokerages must transfer unused funds back to the customer's bank account as part of the new account settlement process. Under the new norms,… [+2513 chars]

articles.title: India better placed than others, still on course for 7% growth, says CEA - The Economic Times
articles.description: India's fiscal policy was not overly expansionary during the pandemic. Monetary policy did not expand the balance sheet as much as in other countries, nor was there a leverage build-up.
